name: Little Star (Happy)
description:
This game was based on the experience of a friend of mine (who has bibliophobia)

Goal: Escape (logic)

How to play: To move use WASD or ARROWS (SHIFT to run)

You will hear the sound of a paper crushing. When you hear it, press "Q" immediately to stop reading.

EVERYTHING WAS MADE BY ME (even the pixel art and animations)

The game is unfinnished due to personal problems.
